titles.title: CARING for Our Veterans Health Act of 2025
CARING for Our Veterans Health Act of 2025
Coordinating and Aligning Records to Improve and Normalize Governance for Our Veterans Health Act of 2025

A bill to require implementation by the Under Secretary for Health of the Department of Veterans Affairs of certain recommendations relating to the provision of health care through community care providers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.
